name: Out of Sight
minDescription: Reduces the radius you can be detected while Sneaking by 1 meter per stage. Current bonus: 0 meters
maxDescription: Reduces the radius you can be detected while Sneaking by 1 meter per stage. Current bonus: 3 meters

name: Fleet Phantom
minDescription: Reduces the Movement Speed penalty of Sneak by 5% per stage. Current bonus: 0% reduced penalty
maxDescription: Reduces the Movement Speed penalty of Sneak by 5% per stage. Current bonus: 25% reduced penalty

name: Friends in Low Places
minDescription: Removes 1000 gold from your bounty once per day when committing a crime where bounty is added.  You must be level 50 for this passive to activate, and your current bounty must be at or greater than 1000 gold.
maxDescription: Removes 1000 gold from your bounty once per day when committing a crime where bounty is added.  You must be level 50 for this passive to activate, and your current bounty must be at or greater than 1000 gold.

name: Infamous
minDescription: Increases the value of fenced items by 25%.
maxDescription: Increases the value of fenced items by 25%.

name: Shadowstrike
minDescription: When you kill an enemy with Blade of Woe, you become invisible for 5 seconds after a short delay while distracting nearby enemies or potential witnesses.  While under this effect you can cast Blade of Woe.
maxDescription: When you kill an enemy with Blade of Woe, you become invisible for 5 seconds after a short delay while distracting nearby enemies or potential witnesses.  While under this effect you can cast Blade of Woe.

name: Cutpurse's Art
minDescription: Increases the chance to get higher-quality loot when pickpocketing.
maxDescription: Increases the chance to get higher-quality loot when pickpocketing.

name: Fade Away
minDescription: Escaping from a Guard wipes 25% of your current Heat, but not Bounty.
maxDescription: Escaping from a Guard wipes 25% of your current Heat, but not Bounty.

name: Master Gatherer
minDescription: Reduces the time it takes to harvest by 10% per stage. Current bonus: 0% time reduction
maxDescription: Reduces the time it takes to harvest by 10% per stage. Current bonus: 50% time reduction

name: Treasure Hunter
minDescription: Increase the quality of items you find in treasure chests.
maxDescription: Increase the quality of items you find in treasure chests.

name: Steadfast Enchantment
minDescription: Your Weapon Enchants decay 20% slower per stage. Current bonus: 0% reduced decay rate
maxDescription: Your Weapon Enchants decay 20% slower per stage. Current bonus: 100% reduced decay rate

name: Rationer
minDescription: Adds 10 minutes to the duration of any eaten food or drink per stage. Current bonus: 0 minutes
maxDescription: Adds 10 minutes to the duration of any eaten food or drink per stage. Current bonus: 30 minutes

name: Liquid Efficiency
minDescription: Whenever you use a potion or poison you have a 10% chance to not consume it.
maxDescription: Whenever you use a potion or poison you have a 10% chance to not consume it.

name: Angler's Instincts
minDescription: Increases your chance of catching higher quality fish, akin to fishing with another player. This effect can stack with other similar bonuses.
maxDescription: Increases your chance of catching higher quality fish, akin to fishing with another player. This effect can stack with other similar bonuses.

name: Reel Technique
minDescription: Decreases the time it take for a fish to bite by 25%.
maxDescription: Decreases the time it take for a fish to bite by 25%.

name: Homemaker

maxDescription: You have a 10% chance to find a second furnishing plan whenever you find a furnishing plan in the world.

maxDescription: Reduces the cost of Wayshrine usage by 10% per stage. Current bonus: 50% cost reduction

maxDescription: You have a 10% chance to gain double the yield from normal resource nodes per stage. Current bonus: 50% chance
